anime.description: * Based on the Annyeong Jaduya series of comics by http://anidb.net/cr48811 [Yi Bin], that began serialization in 1997. Annyeong!! Jaduya!! (Hello Jadoo) follows the story of a Korean elementary school girl named Jadu Choi, based on late 1970s and early 1980s, and the story centers around her mischievous adventures with her friends and family. Episodes are numbered on Korean production order. Air dates are given in Korean airing order. Note that they do not align, as this is a common practice in Korean TV productions.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: manga
tag.description: Manga is the lifeblood that drives the anime industry. Everything and its mother is based on manga. However! There are exceptions where the manga was not the basis for the anime. It`s common practice to make manga adaptations of many popular anime, there`s a manga based on Evangelion, and two (one shounen and one shoujo) based on each of Escaflowne and Mahou Tsukai Tai. Also it`s quite common to release manga and anime versions of a story in parallel, for instance Nadesico and Shoujo Kakumei Utena. There are also cases where an anime continues in a manga, as in the case of Angel Beats! and Angel Beats: Heaven`s Door, or reverse. See also http://anidb.net/t6493 [manhua] and http://anidb.net/t5010 [manhwa].

tag.name: comedy
tag.description: Anime whose central struggle causes hilarious results. These stories are built upon funny characters, situations and events. A comedy anime is laced with humour and sets out to provoke laughter from the audience. Japanese humour can be a bit strange to westerners, so if you`re new to this type of humour, just bear with it; it`ll most likely grow on you if you`re a fan of other kinds of comedy.

character.name: Choi Jadoo
character.description: Choi Jadoo is the main character of Hello Jadoo. She is the eldest child/daughter of her family. She has a tomboyish personality and a known to be a troublemaker. She doesn`t like people bossing her around, telling her what to do and she doesn`t like people judging her. Jadoo loves playing outdoors activity and dislikes doing her homework. She can also be very understanding and caring.

episode.title: Episode 20
엄마 안녕
episode.summary: Jadoo begins to doubt that her mom might not be her real mom. Jadoo`s uncle, who lives in the United States invites her to his place, but it`s not easy to travel.

episode.title: Episode 19
최고의 선물 / 더러운 거 싫어
episode.summary: Mom has been suffering from a toothache for a long time, and she needs to have a gold tooth put in. Jadoo goes to the dentist only to realize that she can`t afford it. Unlike Jadoo, the little one (baby) is so tidy that he washes himself even at a very little dirt. One day, Baby meets a pretty girl at the kindergarten.

episode.title: Episode 18
선생님 돌아오세요 / 기묘한 이야기
episode.summary: Teacher Lee is absent, and the principal takes his place. Unlike his kind first impression, he begins to show his true colors... Jadoo and friends talk about some scary stories. And Jadoo tells what she had actually experienced.

episode.title: Episode 17
성탄절 연극 소동 / 예삐를 찾아라
episode.summary: Jadoo hears about a Christmas play at the church. She wants to play Maria, but will her wish become true? Minji`s puppy is missing. Jadoo and friends set up an investigation team to find the dog.

episode.title: Episode 16
미미의 봄 / 골드레인저 자두
episode.summary: Jadoo makes fun of Mimi in front of June. Mimi is disappointed because she secretly admires him. Jadoo loves the Gold Rangers and want to be like them.

episode.title: Episode 15
그런 슬픈 눈으로 보지 말아요 / 할머니는 무서워
episode.summary: Jadoo comes to know about her mom`s past. She was very pretty and her first love was an owner of an orchard. He seemed really nice too. Jadoo wonders why mom got married to her dad and not him. Jadoo`s grandmother visits Jadoo`s, and scolds her for having bad habits.

episode.title: Episode 14
골드레인저 / 삼각관계
episode.summary: Jadoo wants to watch the preview of `Gold Rangers` to see a famous actor, but she doesn`t have ticket. She tries to sneak into the theater. Jadoo meets with Nuri, a friend of Minji. Nuri teases Jadoo and tries to exploit Minji. Jadoo tries to stop her.

episode.title: Episode 13
발렌타인 초콜릿은 누구에게 / 나도 오빠가 있었으면 좋겠다
episode.summary: It is Valentine`s day, and the boys in Jadoo`s class tries to be nice to the girls to earn some chocolate. Jadoo is envious of Minji, who has three older brothers. But Minji is envious of Jadoo who has a little brother and a sister. Somehow their souls are exchanged, and they experience each others` lives.

episode.title: Episode 12
게임 중독 / 엄마의 빈자리
episode.summary: Jadoo start playing a game, and becomes addicted to it. To solve the problem her mom makes a crucial decision. Mom goes to visit grandmother. While she`s away, all the foods go bad and even a thief enters Jadoo`s house.

episode.title: Episode 11
예뻐지고 싶어 / 자두 춘향이가 된 사연
episode.summary: Jadoo thinks she`s ugly, and wants to brighten her face. She goes to find an old lady who knows the secret folk remedies. Jadoo lands in trouble while playing with Doldol. What could it be?

episode.title: Episode 10
공포특집 / 착해지긴 힘들어
episode.summary: Jadoo has to go find Minji`s notebook at school late at night, as there is a test on Monday. On her way to school, she meets Doldol and suggests to go with her. Jadoo plans to become nice and kind, and tries to do something good. However things don`t go well as she thought.

episode.title: Episode 9
아빠 사고 치다 / 남들 다하는 과외
episode.summary: Jadoo`s dad quits his job without discussing it with family beforehand. Mother worries about Jadoo`s low grades, and finally makes her get private lessons.

episode.title: Episode 8
천국 노래자랑 / 내 친구 매미
episode.summary: Jadoo`s uncle visits her house, and says he will enter the singing contest. Eventually, all of the Jadoo`s familly join it. Maemi loves heavy metal music, and doesn`t like to get out of her room. Jadoo sympathizes with her and tries to be close with her.

episode.title: Episode 7
자두와 병아리 / 엄마와 자두의 한판승
episode.summary: Jadoo buys a chick on the street, but it later on it turns out to be a different type of animal. Jadoo is always scolded by her mother. However, today Jadoo tries to trick her.

episode.title: Episode 6
자두 할머니댁에 가다 / 나와 함께 춤을
episode.summary: Jadoo visits her grandmother`s house. Soon, the toughest times of Jadoo`s life begin. On the medical checkup day, Minji keeps the fatty Doldol`s weight secret. Doldol begins to like her, but Minji doesn`t seem to like him.

episode.title: Episode 5
자매 전쟁 / 엄마 없는 하늘 아래
episode.summary: Jadoo is unhappy thinking that her mom only cares about her younger sister, Mimi. Jadoo`s mother leaves home for days, and then each and every member of the family start to go wild...

episode.title: Episode 4
좋으면 좋다고 말해 / 나의 프라이버시를 지켜줘
episode.summary: Jadoo eats like a horse and has a stomachache on her picnic day. She goes to the bathroom behind the trees only to hear a clicking sound. She spots a classmate holding a camera in his hands! After realizing that her mother is secretly reading her diary, Jadoo tries to protect it.

episode.title: Episode 3
우리 딸이 최고 / 엄마의 사과
episode.summary: Jadoo`s father wants Jadoo to win a beauty contest, but will she ever make it? Due to the oil crisis Jadoo`s family faces financial difficulties. Jadoo starts a part-time job in order to be of help.

episode.title: Episode 2
자두가 좋아 / 내가 도둑이라고?
episode.summary: Sunghun transfers to Jadoo`s classroom, and falls in love with Jadoo at first sight. One of Jadoo`s classmates has her money stolen, and Jadoo is the key suspect....

episode.title: My name is Choi Jadoo / Mom VS Dad
내 이름은 최자두 / 엄마 VS 아빠
episode.summary: Jadoo is always causing accidents at school. Jadoo gets annoyed by the bickering between her parents, but her friends find it funny.
